channel.title: Income Tax Refund
channel.description: Recent content on Income Tax Refund

item.title: CIA DÃ©butante + Kevin Diesel + Little Gem Band + bincent3000 tattoo parlour
item.description: income tax refund presents Thursday, 27 July Where: private ranch Doors: ???? Start: ???? CIA DÃ©butante (france) sluggish pools of greyscale electronics and viscous synth blubber, prodded by corroded beats and warped dictaphone gargle Down, Willow (Siltbreeze, 2023) Dust (Siltbreeze, 2021) Slow Cancellation (Premier Sang, 2019) https://youtu.be/G5Q8qCfuvj0 Kevin Diesel (france) aka. Flo of PartoutPartout/100%chevalier - will likely lauch some banging musical rockets to the rhythm of the machines. this’s gonna go so hard!

item.title: Alpha Strategy + HUGAYZ + Bentley Anderson
item.description: income tax refund presents a musical transmission at the TV Studio East on Wednesday, 5 July with the artists: Alpha Strategy (noisy noise rock from Czechia) HUGAYZ (eggy punk from Poland // plusz tapes) Bentley Anderson (guitar manglings from NYC // Trouble In Mind Records) GMO-flavoured daisy by Aranzazu Morena Doors: 19h00 Start: 20h00 End: 22h30 Alpha Strategy The Caressing Cloth (single, 2022) \ HUGAYZ Hugz and Kissez (album, 2021)

item.title: BÃ¢ton XXL + Giulio Erasmus + Hell.no
item.description: income tax refund presents the night of the solos at T|FF! with BÃ¢ton XXL [amiÃ¨ns, france] amplified percussions, improved performance, retroaction, trance, voice = Romain Simon of formerly Headwar, Me Donner etc etc https://baton.hotglue.me/?baton https://batonxxl.bandcamp.com/ Giulio Erasmus [brussels, manchester] Lo-fi dub waves by the DUDS and HANDLE funkstar https://absolutefiction.bandcamp.com/album/giulio-erasmus-re-adjustment Hell.no [leepzzg] …of Heike Bartsch fame. item.title: Bitchin Bajas + Acid Rooster + GLOBAL WARMING
item.description: income tax refund presents cosmic electronic dreams at the Ranch on Monday 24th April with: Bitchin Bajas (Chicago) , Acid Rooster (Schweinfurt) & DJ GLOBAL WARMING (Leipzig) Monday 24th April Doors 18h30 // Start 20h30 location: the RÃ¤nch registration via: fritz[Ã¤t]u-bac.de Intergalactic poster art by Aranzazu Morena Bitchin Bajas Chicago’s ruling oscillator wranglers! Can you believed it? https://bitchinbajas.bandcamp.com/album/bajascillators Acid Rooster Exclusive, guitar-and-drum-free, electronics-only setup for you to space out. https://cful.bandcamp.com/album/acid-rooster-ad-astra https://acidrooster.

item.title: BRAK + Polsoja + Abrichten
item.description: income tax refund presents a noisy punky madness at the Xxxl Xxlxx trailer park on Tuesday 25th April with the bands: BRAK (berlin) POLSOJA (warsaw) ABRICHTEN (leipzig) Toaster art by Aranzazu Morena Doors 19h00 Start 20h00 BRAK Noisy, dragging no wave punk, cascades of sounds accelerating, rotting and falling apart https://br4k.bandcamp.com POLSOJA Abstract & frenetic guitar noise trio https://polsoja.bandcamp.com https://plusztapes.bandcamp.com/album/bardzo-ci-lubi ABRICHTEN A rare chance to see your local retro noise rock heralds http://abrichten.

So, get a good dose of ant-like rhythms, whippy guitars, with an icing of synthscapes and some bel cantos on top.

item.title: Atol Atol Atol, Mellie, Planets Are On It
item.description: Next income tax refund show this Friday (13th â€“ sorry) at Gleiserei/end of Eisi. Doors: 19h00 äººäººäºº Start: 20h15 Thanks to Lars Spasz for his â€Designâ€œ https://www.instagram.com/larsspaszdesigns/ ATOL ATOL ATOL (Wroclaw/Poland) [jagged, frantic p-punk] feat. members of Kurws, Ukryte Zalety Systemu and Przepych. Clean, cool basslines intermingling with alarm-sound synths, springy guitars and zesty vocals. It’s rhythmic, it’s repetitive and’s got some dense drum action with funky jam block ’n’ cowbell sprinkles going on, too.

item.title: Jooklo Duo, Mik Quantius, Steffen Roth + Stephan Deller + Gregor Forbes
item.description: Last show for this year! äººäººäºº Don’t miss it! Doors: 19h00 äººäººäºº Start: 20h15 Jooklo Duo [psychjazz / Italy] Was about time to bring the Jooklo experience to our little fair city. Roaming the improv and weird music underground already since the mid-00’s, David Vanzan and Virginia Genta (also known through projects such as Golden Jooklo Age, Jooklo Quartet, Jooklo Stellar Tribe, Neokarma Jooklo Trio, New Jooklo Age etc.) will now bring some chakric, mental no-jazz to Leipzig for the first time.

item.title: Ka Baird, T.u.B., Good Luck (DJ)
item.description: Ka Baird (RVNG Intl) Woodwind instruments fans listen up! Ka Baird is coming to our little aviary. Ka are a performer, composer, and sound designer from NYC. They’ve releases out on reliable labels such as RVNG Intl., FRKWYS, and Drag City, plus a whole bunch of psych-folk rite records with Spires That In The Sunset Rise group. As for solo live performances, Ka uses extended vocal, breath and microphone techniques that intermingle with atypical electronic and flutes sounds creating a strange world of sonic fun, improvised noise, strange movements.

item.title: Alpha Strategy, Forbidden Wizards, Tim Dahl + Thore Warland
item.description: Unfortunately TIPP + SPIELO had to cancel their show(s) but they’ll be back in Leipzig soon enough. Line-up for this show now is: ALPHA STRATEGY [weirdonoisyrock | Prague] https://alphastrategy.bandcamp.com https://youtu.be/8rTwM7s5Cnw FORBIDDEN WIZARDS [epilepticHChighspeednoisepunk | Rotterdam] https://forbiddenwizards.bandcamp.com https://youtu.be/jntdy8BZTK8 TIM DAHL + THORE WARLAND [bass+mental drum loop madness/ free jazz? double | Brooklyn/Stavanger] Video of tim dahl solo Ã¤t Hitness club:: https://youtu.be/8Vqo8AX39BY Friday30th September @Gleiserei Start:20h00 sharp! / Curfew bands 23h00!

item.title: Claws Of Saurtopia & U-Bac present: KURWS + ZdrÃ³j
item.description: two mindmeltingly fine avant-punk acts from Poland Links: https://kurws.bandcamp.com/album/powi-fascia https://zdroj.bandcamp.com/ Thanks to HOLOB for the artwork. Further advice: please watch your personal belongings at the show as there have been thefts during a recent show. We also received reports of incidents with knockout drops in the neighborhood â€“ get in touch with us and/or the people at the bar if you notice something or need help. Wednesday October 26th SPXLXNKX (Le-West)

item.title: Leep, Rosa Blaulicht, Zad Kokar
item.description: Happy happy happy to be teaming up with PRACHT again (it’s been a while!) to bring you this sweet little package right here: ZAD KOKAR [solo bouncy no-wave shreds] Last Strasbourgeoise standing - ZAD KOKAR - is gonna hit the road solo this time and deliver some screeching and distorted no-wave guitar-noise jams with occassional opportunities to dance and jive. https://petite-nature.bandcamp.com Rosa Blaulicht [deathrock-ish post-punk] https://rosablaulicht.bandcamp.com LEEP [gloomy and slowcore-y]
